Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Prohibits telephone corporations from charging a caller any increased rates, charges, or fees for long-distance or other calls without first notifying such caller
Summary: Prohibits telephone corporations from charging a caller any increased rates, charges, or fees for long-distance or other calls without first notifying such caller.
LawCode: Amd ยง91, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to prohibiting telephone corporations from charging a caller any increased rates, charges, or fees for long-distance or other calls without first notifying such caller
